meta_title: What Is OEE? Definition, Formula, and Key Metrics
meta_description: OEE (Overall Equipment Effectiveness) measures manufacturing productivity by analyzing availability, performance, and quality to identify operational waste.
title: What Is OEE?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is OEE?

image_prompt: A professional, photo-realistic industrial setting showing a diverse team of two maintenance engineers in high-visibility vests and hard hats. They are standing in a clean, high-tech factory bay, looking at a large wall-mounted digital dashboard displaying real-time production analytics and green/yellow/red performance gauges. The background features complex automated machinery and robotic arms in a soft focus. No text on the screen or in the image.
